price: (الله تعالی) وویل: ای موسى آيا دې لپاره راته راغلى يې چې په خپلو كوډو مو له خپل وطنه وباسې.
arabic: قَالَ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتُخۡرِجَنَا مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَا بِسِحۡرِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla aji'tanā litukh'rijanā min arḍinā bisiḥ'rika yāmūsā
